A

addBullets() - Method in class GameEngine
This method is called at the end of update() to add all the newly stored bullets each frame.
addEnemyBullet(EnemyShipShooter) - Method in class GameEngine
This method adds an enemy bullet to the shooter ship directed to the location of the player.
addGameObject(GameObject) - Method in class GameEngine
This method adds a game object to our game.
addPlayerBullet(MouseEvent) - Method in class GameEngine
This method adds a player bullet to our world according to the location given by paramMouseEvent.
